tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited to see Dr Suneela for Allergy Testing for my daughter as she has allergic rhinitis. I was very pleased by Dr Suneela‘a professional , polite and precise approach  and she was patient and  wonderful to my 11 year old daughter . My daughter was very very anxious to have skin prick allergy test but Dr Suneela was very quick to build rapport with her and explained the procedure so well to my daughter such that it allayed her anxiety completely. 

Myself being a doctor in UK and having lived there for 15 years I must say Dr Suneela was excellent and comparable to any , in fact better than specialist doctors in UK . Thank you Dr Suneela

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We recently visited this clinic due to my kid was down with dry cough. Dr. Suneela said it seems wheezing issue and she prescribed an inhaler with Foracart without any proper examine. It’s a type of steroid. After two times using, it developed too much reddish inside the throat and sivior throat pain.. The pain increased and developed too worse while eating and drinking. And seen rashes on his face. Skin in His hands are pealing off. He missed his final all his exams due to this. Think about his parents situation. ** *** * ******* ** **** *** ********* *** *** ***** *** ******* **** ******* *** ************ **** ********** ******* ****** ******* ** *** ******* *** **** ** ********* ****** **** ** ** ************ ** * ****** *** *** ***** ** ** **** **** ***** ** *********** ****** * **** ******* ********* **** *** ***** ******* ***** *** ** ****** *** ** ****** ********* Please don’t ever try to meet her for medical treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She makes the child feel very comfortable and explains the issue and treatment patiently. Her prescription with persistent cough really helped us
